## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like.

## Problem Statement
What problem does this feature solve? Is this related to a frustration with the current behavior?

Describe the solution you'd like. How should this feature work?

## Alternatives Considered
Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

```
# Example command or interaction
codecrew --new-feature
> @claude help me with...
```
